page.title: 07Telscombe School History
page.content: The primary school opened in 1938 with one building.The school was previously sited in peacehaven & called the Peacehaven Cliff Park temporary coun- cil school.The school moved to new premises in April 1938.The reprograph -ics room used to be the kitchen & the children ate at their desks.The compu- ter room used to be a cloakroom. The middle class rooms had a partition which could be pulled back making room for an assembly. The horsa hut was built as a canteen for Canadians during the war.The Library was origin- ally the kitchen and the other room the dining area. The main building was extended by two class rooms in the late 50's. The medway hut was added as a youth wing.There are now 17 classes, 18 teachers & 493 children. Richard Moore age9
